title: A Sex God
description: Nia Carnahan can't take her eyes off the man who looks like her ex-boyfriend, Max, who she's not seen in more than twenty years. She keeps seeing him at the book store and at her gym. She's not sure if she'd prefer he'd be the real Max or a sexy look-a-like. Either way, he steals her breath and invades her dreams.Lee Doyle has his eye on Nia, too. After eyeing each other for months, he finally approaches her at the gym where he works to offer his assistance.
author: Ashley Ladd
